verses.verse: The mighty <S%H410><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, even the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, has spoken <S%H1696><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> from the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%> unto the going down there <S%H3996><s%>.
Out of Zion <S%H6726><s%>, the perfection <S%H4359><s%> of beauty <S%H3308><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> has shined <S%H3313><s%>.

Our God <S%H430><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%>, and shall not keep silence <S%H2790><s%>: a fire <S%H784><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H3966><s%>, and it shall be very stormy <S%H8175><s%> round about him <S%H5439><s%>.
He shall call <S%H7121><s%> to the heavens <S%H8064><s%> from above <S%H5920><s%>, and to the earth <S%H776><s%>, that he may judge <S%H1777><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>.
Gather <S%H622><s%> my saints <S%H2623><s%> together unto me <S%H3772><s%>; those that have made a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with me by sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>.
And the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall declare <S%H5046><s%> his righteousness <S%H6664><s%>: for God <S%H430><s%> is judge <S%H8199><s%> himself <S%H5542><s%>. Selah.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O my people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%>; O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and I will testify <S%H5749><s%> against you <S%H430><s%>: I am God, even your God <S%H430><s%>.
I will not rebuke <S%H3198><s%> you for your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> or your burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, that have been continually before me <S%H8548><s%>.
I will take <S%H3947><s%> no bullock <S%H6499><s%> out of your house <S%H1004><s%>, nor he goats <S%H6260><s%> out of your folds <S%H4356><s%>.
For every animal <S%H2416><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%> is mine <S%H929><s%>, and the cattle upon a thousand <S%H505><s%> hills <S%H2042><s%>.
I know <S%H3045><s%> all the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>: and the wild animals <S%H2123><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> are mine <S%H5978><s%>.
If I were hungry <S%H7456><s%>, I would not tell <S%H559><s%> you <S%H8398><s%>: for the world is mine <S%H4393><s%>, and the fullness there.
Will I eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of bulls <S%H47><s%>, or drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of goats <S%H6260><s%>?
Offer <S%H2076><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%> thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>; and pay <S%H7999><s%> your vows <S%H5088><s%> unto the most High <S%H5945><s%>:
And call <S%H7121><s%> upon me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>: I will deliver <S%H2502><s%> you <S%H3513><s%>, and you shall glorify me.

But unto the wicked <S%H7563><s%> God <S%H430><s%> says <S%H559><s%>, What have you to do to declare <S%H5608><s%> my statutes <S%H2706><s%>, or that you should take <S%H5375><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> in your mouth <S%H6310><s%>?
Seeing you hate <S%H8130><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> behind you <S%H310><s%>.
When you saw <S%H7200><s%> a thief <S%H1590><s%>, then you consented <S%H7521><s%> with him <S%H2506><s%>, and have been partaker with adulterers <S%H5003><s%>.
You give <S%H7971><s%> your mouth <S%H6310><s%> to evil <S%H7451><s%>, and your tongue <S%H3956><s%> frames <S%H6775><s%> deceit <S%H4820><s%>.
You sit <S%H3427><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> against your brother <S%H251><s%>; you <S%H5414><s%> slander <S%H1848><s%> your own mother <S%H517><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>.

These things have you done <S%H6213><s%>, and I kept silence <S%H2790><s%>; you thought <S%H1819><s%> that I was altogether <S%H1961><s%> such a one as yourself <S%H3198><s%>: but I will rebuke you <S%H6186><s%>, and set them in order before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>.
Now consider <S%H995><s%> this <S%H7911><s%>, you that forget God <S%H433><s%>, lest I tear you in pieces <S%H2963><s%>, and there be none to deliver <S%H5337><s%>.

Whoever offers <S%H2076><s%> praise <S%H8426><s%> glorifies <S%H3513><s%> me <S%H7760><s%>: and to him that orders his behavior <S%H1870><s%> rightly will I show <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3468><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.
